sentence.Network_en: They meant to finish her off, swiftly and without mercy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们打算毫不留情地迅速结果了她。

sentence.Network_en: She ran swiftly over the lawn to the gate.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一溜烟穿过草地跑到了大门口。

sentence.Network_en: The French have acted swiftly and decisively to protect their industries.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国人采取了迅速而果断的行动来保护他们的产业。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文绕口令_百度知道 ... 1. swan: 天鹅 2. swiftly: 迅速地；快捷地 1. rite: 仪式；典礼.
‘飞’在字典中的意思_百度知道 ... [turn very fast] 飞速旋转 1. 疾速[ swiftly] 3. 没有根据的[ groundless;unfounded].
The Great Debaters ... severity 严格 swiftly 很快地; 即刻 compendiums 大要, 概略.
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... department n. 部门；系 swiftly ad. 快速地；敏捷地 swift a. 敏捷的，迅速的.

list.abs: in this particular financial meltdown governments all over the world , to their credit have acted swiftly , decisively and in concert to put the brakes on the panic which overtook the private sector .在这一特定金融危机为世界各地的政府，他们的信贷已迅速采取行动，果断和一致，使刹车的恐慌取代私营部门。
how shall we pass most swiftly from point to point , and be present always at the focus where the greatest number of unite in their purest energy ?我们要如何才能最迅速地从一处前往另一处，并且总在最蓬勃的生机以最纯粹的能量聚集于一点时及时出现？
like streak of sable lightning wheels and cries the Stormy Petrel , piercing storm-clouds like an arrow , cutting swiftly through the waters .海燕叫喊着，飞翔着，像黑色的闪电，箭一般地穿过乌云，翅膀掠起波浪的飞沫。
I intend to urge him to bring pressure on all regulatory agencies to move swiftly .我要督促他对所有制定规章的机构施加压力，叫他们动作快点。

entry.def: A swift event or process happens very quickly or without delay.

example.ex: Our task is to challenge the UN to make a swift decision...
example.tran: 我们的任务是敦促联合国快速做出决策。

example.ex: The police were swift to act.

entry.tran: 快速移动的;速度非常快的
entry.def: Something that is swift moves very quickly.

example.ex: With a swift movement, Matthew Jerrold sat upright.
example.tran: 马修· 杰罗尔德迅速坐直了。

entry.def: A swift is a small bird with long curved wings.

auth_sentence.content: His fall follows swiftly and brings chaos to Russia.
auth_sentence.res_content: His fall follows swiftly and brings chaos to Russia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His fall follows swiftly and brings chaos to Russia.

auth_sentence.content: I need to reduce this number, and swiftly.
auth_sentence.res_content: I need to reduce this number, and swiftly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I need to reduce this number, and swiftly.

auth_sentence.content: Tory MPs urged the Prime Minister to move swiftly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tory MPs urged the Prime Minister to move swiftly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tory MPs urged the Prime Minister to move swiftly.

sentences.en: the capacity to respond swiftly to market changes
sentences.cn: 对市场变化能迅速作出反应的能力

sentences.en: The police must be able to react swiftly in an emergency.
sentences.cn: 警方在面对紧急情况时必须能迅速作出反应。
